attributes.action: Raise the speed limit for HGV's on the A9 from Perth from 40 to 50mph.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When I drive north I find that I create a long line of traffic because of the limit if 40mph. If the limit were raised to 50mph it would make it safer and a more enjoyable drive for other road users.
